DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the role of 1. dietary calcium in fecal fat loss and the association between lactose maldigestion, dietary calcium level and source, and weight loss induced by caloric restriction. 2. caloric restriction on biomarkers of inflammation and oxidative stress
DOC.brief_title: Caloric Restriction and Body Weight in Adults
DOC.criteria: 18 65 years old Healthy Body weight more than 300 lbs (body composition measurement instrument limit) diabetes Heart disease
